dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3458216J] Notice of Copyright Infringement and Unauthorized Posting
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Monday, March 12, 2007 8:05 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3458216J] Notice of Copyright Infringement and Unauthorized Posting of Confidential Materials. ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Notice of Copyright Infringement and Unauthorized Posting of Confidential Materials. Added by system at Monday, Mar 12 2007 12:14 pm X-MailFrom: Jeremy.Gunnoe@sprint.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Mon Mar 12 12:14:02 2007 Received: (qmail 21062 invoked by alias); Mon, 12 Mar 2007 12:13:49 -0500 (CDT) Received: from pdawg06a.ad.sprint.com (PDAWG06A.corp.sprint.com [10.122.2.33]) by mailhost.sprintspectrum.com (Switch-3.2.5/Switch-3.2.5) with ESMTP id l2CHDnC3025826 for ; Mon, 12 Mar 2007 12:13:49 -0500 (CDT) Received: from PLSWB09C.ad.sprint.com ([208.10.70.239]) by pdawg06a.ad.sprint.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 12 Mar 2007 12:13:49 -0500 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C764C9.CCC59F15" Disposition-Notification-To: "Gunnoe, Jeremy [Kelly Services Contractor for Sprint]" Subject: Notice of Copyright Infringement and Unauthorized Posting of Confidential Materials. Date: Mon, 12 Mar 2007 12:13:47 -0500 Message-ID: <7C861AC9DD0D154FBEF7609FE20397CB0C86C6D4@PLSWB09C.ad.sprint.com> X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Notice of Copyright Infringement and Unauthorized Posting of Confidential Materials. Thread-Index: Acdkxu3y0HecX2e4T1CLfB9J0EPQJwAAVBsA From: "Gunnoe, Jeremy [Kelly Services Contractor for Sprint]" To: X-OriginalArrivalTime: 12 Mar 2007 17:13:49.0584 (UTC) FILETIME=[CD1DE100:01C764C9] Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of sprint.com designates 213.199.154.10 as permitted sender) client-ip=213.199.154.10; envelope-from=Jeremy.Gunnoe@sprint.com; helo=mail19-dub-R.bigfish.com; (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) RE: Notice of Copyright Infringement Pursuant to DMCA and Unauthorized Posting of Confidential Materials Date of Infringement: March 6, 2007 Dear Site Owner, You are receiving this notice because you are the technical or administrative contact for the web site www.sprintusers.com. Sprint has learned that an entry has been posted at http://www.sprintusers.com that discloses confidential Sprint corporate information. Sprint is the owner of the exclusive rights to the information. The information posted had not been released for public knowledge or otherwise made available to the public and was, in fact, obtained from an internal corporate document that is protected by US copyright laws. The forum entry is located at http://www.sprintusers.com/forum/showthread.php?t=127921. The unauthorized distribution of this material constitutes copyright infringement under the Copyright Act, Title 17 United States Code Section 106(3)-(4). This conduct may also violate the laws of other countries, international law, and/or treaty obligations. As the owner of the site or operator of the network it is offered on, Sprint requests that you immediately do the following: 1. Remove or disable access to the material identified above, and 2. Take appropriate action against the account holder. On behalf of the owners of the exclusive rights to the copyrighted material at issue in this notice, I hereby state, pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, Title 17 United States Code Section 512, that the information in this notification is accurate and that I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owners, their respective agents, or the law and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner. Please contact me should you have any questions. Sprint thanks you for your cooperation in this matter. Your prompt response is requested. Sincerely, Jeremy Gunnoe Legal Analyst Sprint Nextel 6450 Sprint Pkwy Overland Park, KS 66251 913.315.9411 jeremy.gunnoe@sprint.com MIME element (text/html) Notice of Copyright Infringement and Unauthorized Posting of Confidential Materials.

RE:     Notice of Copyright Infringement Pursuant to DMCA and Unauthorized Posting of Confidential Materials

 

Date of Infringement: March 6, 2007

Dear Site Owner,

You are receiving this notice because you are the technical or administrative contact for the web site www.sprintusers.com.  Sprint has learned that an entry has been posted at http://www.sprintusers.com that discloses confidential Sprint corporate information.  Sprint is the owner of the exclusive rights to the information.  The information posted had no! t been released for public knowledge or otherwise made available to the public and was, in fact, obtained from an internal corporate document that is protected by US copyright laws.  The forum entry is located at http://w ww.sprintusers.com/forum/showthread.php?t=127921. 

The unauthorized distribution of this material constitutes copyright infringement under the Copyright Act, Title 17 United States Code Section 106(3)-(4). This conduct may also violate the laws of other countries, international law, and/or treaty obligations.

As the owner of the site or operator of the network it is offered on, Sprint requests that you immediately do the following:

1. Remove or disable access to the material identified above, and

2. Take appropriate action against the account holder.

On behalf of the owners of the exclusive rights to the copyrighted material at issue in this notice, I hereby state, pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, Title 17 United States Code Section 512, that the information in this notification is accurate and that I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owners, their respective agents, or the law and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner.

Please contact me should you have any questions.  Sprint thanks you for your cooperation in this matter.  Your prompt response is requested.

Sincerely,

Jeremy Gunnoe

Legal Analyst

Sprint Nextel

6450 Sprint Pkwy

Overland Park, KS 66251

913.315.9411

jeremy.gunnoe@sprint.com
